mapper.select: SELECT ID, PASSWD, NAME, NICK, GENDER, BIRTH, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDR, GRADE, CGRADE, POINT, BANCNT1, BANCNT2, PWCONT, AUTH1YN, AUTH2YN, CREAFLG, ADMINFLG, USTATUS FROM T3_USER
SELECT T.TBNO AS TBNO, COUNT(JJNO) AS SUMJIMCNT FROM T3_TBRD T LEFT JOIN T3_JJIM J ON T.TBNO=J.TBNO GROUP BY T.TBNO
SELECT CNUM, CINFO FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="BRDFLG"
SELECT CNUM, CINFO FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="KIND" AND PCOMM1=#{pcomm1}
SELECT CNUM, CINFO FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="CATE1"
SELECT CNUM, CINFO, PCOMM1 FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="CATE2" AND PCOMM1=#{pcomm1}
SELECT CNUM, CINFO FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="CATE3"
SELECT PHONE, EMAIL, CREAFLG FROM T3_USER WHERE ID=#{userid}
SELECT DISTINCT(gu) AS gu FROM T_AREA WHERE si=#{local1name} ORDER BY gu ASC
SELECT DISTINCT(dong) AS dong FROM T_AREA WHERE si=#{local1name} and gu=#{local2name} ORDER BY dong ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T3_TBRD VALUES (NULL, #{id}, #{bprice}, #{btitle}, #{bcont}, 0, 0, #{brdflg}, #{kind}, #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{cate3}, #{bprod}, #{bpros}, #{bstatus}, #{bpur}, #{bbox}, #{brcpt}, #{bcms}, #{local1}, #{local2}, #{local3}, NULL,NOW(), NULL, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT B.TBNO AS TBNO, U.ID AS ID, NICK, PHONE, EMAIL, BPRICE, BTITLE, BCONT, HITS, LIKES, GRADE, BRDFLG, D1.CINFO AS BRDNAME, D2.CINFO AS KINDNAME, D3.CINFO AS CATE1NAME, D4.CINFO AS CATE2NAME, D5.CINFO AS CATE3NAME, D6.CINFO AS BPRODNAME, D7.CINFO AS BPROSNAME, BSTATUS, D8.CINFO AS BSTATUSNAME, D9.CINFO AS BPURNAME, D10.CINFO AS BBOXNAME, D11.CINFO AS BRCPTNAME, D12.CINFO AS BCMSNAME, LOCAL1 AS LOCAL1NAME, LOCAL2 AS LOCAL2NAME, LOCAL3 AS LOCAL3NAME, T1.PATH AS PATH, TRADE, B.CDATE AS CDATE, UDATE, DELYN FROM T3_TBRD B INNER JOIN T3_USER U ON B.ID = U.ID INNER JOIN T3_DESC D1 ON B.BRDFLG = D1.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D2 ON B.KIND = D2.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D3 ON B.CATE1 = D3.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D4 ON B.CATE2 = D4.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D5 ON B.CATE3 = D5.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D6 ON B.BPROD = D6.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D7 ON B.BPROS = D7.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D8 ON B.BSTATUS = D8.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D9 ON B.BPUR = D9.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D10 ON B.BBOX = D10.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D11 ON B.BRCPT = D11.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D12 ON B.BCMS = D12.CNUM LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBNO,PATH,REP FROM T3_TIMG WHERE REP='Y') T1 ON B.TBNO = T1.TBNO WHERE B.TBNO = #{tbno} ORDER BY TBNO DESC
SELECT SUM(CINFO) FROM T3_GRD GR INNER JOIN T3_DESC D ON GR.GRDNUM = D.CNUM WHERE ID=#{id};

SELECT CNO, C.TBNO AS TBNO, C.CBNO AS CBNO, C.ID AS ID, CONTE, RECONTE, C.CDATE AS CDATE, C.UDATE AS UDATE, RECNO, REVWFLG, SHOWYN, NICK, C.DELYN AS DELYN FROM T3_CMRE C INNER JOIN T3_USER U ON C.ID = U.ID WHERE TBNO=#{tbno} AND REVWFLG=0 ORDER BY CNO ASC

SELECT TBNO, ID, BPRICE, BTITLE, BCONT, HITS, LIKES, BRDFLG, KIND, CATE1, CATE2, CATE3, BPROD, BPROS, BSTATUS, BPUR, BBOX, BRCPT, BCMS, LOCAL1, LOCAL2, LOCAL3, UDATE, DELYN FROM T3_TBRD WHERE TBNO=#{tbno};
SELECT TPATHNO, TBNO, PATH, REP FROM T3_TIMG WHERE TBNO=#{tbno}
mapper.update: UPDATE T3_TBRD SET BPRICE=#{bprice}, BTITLE=#{btitle}, BCONT=#{bcont},BPROD=#{bprod}, CATE1=#{cate1}, CATE2=#{cate2}, CATE3=#{cate3},BPROS=#{bpros}, BSTATUS=#{bstatus}, BPUR=#{bpur}, BBOX=#{bbox},BRCPT=#{brcpt}, BCMS=#{bcms}, LOCAL1=#{local1}, LOCAL2=#{local2}, LOCAL3=#{local3}, uDATE=NOW() WHERE TBNO=#{tbno}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT C.ID AS ID, NICK FROM T3_CMRE C INNER JOIN T3_USER U ON C.ID=U.ID WHERE TBNO=#{tbno} ORDER BY CNO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE T3_TBRD SET TRADE= #{setuid}, BSTATUS = "BS4" WHERE TBNO=#{tbno}
mapper.select: SELECT CNO,RECONTE,CDATE,REVWFLG FROM T3_CMRE WHERE TBNO=#{tbno} AND REVWFLG=1 ORDER BY CNO ASC LIMIT 1;
